data.name: Knight of the Forgotten Realm
data.detailed_description:
Knight of the Forgotten Realm is a 2.5D side-scroller action adventure game set in a war torn-land. After an unprecedented attack on a crucial outpost called the Eyes of Humanity, a god-like being known as an Eternal saves your life. In return, you must venture into forbidden territory to uncover lost knowledge crucial to the realm. Will you survive the Eternal's call?

Visceral Combat
Experience a visceral combo based combat system that is easy to learn, but hard to master. On your journey, you'll discover ancient relics lost to decades of war, unlock numerous abilities, and encounter bosses that'll challenge even the most decorated knight.

Soul Enhancement
With an Eternal bound to your soul, power that was once unthinkable has been unlocked. Every fallen ancient one, demonic beings that roam Elemore, will grant you soul power. Once enough soul power has been obtained, your soul integrity will be increased and soul enhancement points will be gained. These points grant you the ability to enhance your soul, unlocking combos, augments, and passives to aid you on your journey.

A War-torn Land
34 years ago, the Great Burning scarred the realm of Austeria. A once peaceful and harmonious realm, thrown into chaos by a coup d'etat lead by a traitorous royal guard, Typherius. Rivers of blood flowed through the streets of cities who would not bend the knee, who would not denounce the Eternals and burn any knowledge of Eternia. Many paid the ultimate price in the years to come until demonic beings known as the Ancient Ones flooded the eastern lands of Elemore, halting the bloody crusade led by Typherius and refocusing humanities efforts on survival.

data.short_description: Knight of the Forgotten Realm is a 2.5D dark fantasy action adventure game set in the realm of Austeria. Featuring visceral combat and a soul enhancement progression system, you and a godlike being known as an Eternal head east to uncover lost knowledge. Will you survive the Eternal's call?

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
